Core Job Description: Analyze complex data sets to extract actionable insights, build predictive models, and guide strategic business decisions.

Core Job Description: Design, build, and deploy machine learning models and deep learning systems into production environments.

Core Job Description: Monitor systems for security breaches, investigate incidents, and implement security controls and protection measures.
